name: Infugrator – Infusionsoft + WordPress
author: Cosmin Schiopu

sections.description: NOTE: This plugin version is no longer developed, please check the new version here
sections.installation:
1. Install Infugrator either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server. (See instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin)
  2. Activate Infugrator.
  3. Go to Settings and complete all Infusionsoft Details
  4. Navigate through the available modules and activate what you need.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install Infugrator either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server. (See instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin)
  2. Activate Infugrator.
  3. Go to Settings and complete all Infusionsoft Details
  4. Navigate through the available modules and activate what you need.

Do I need to have coding skills to use Infugrator?

Absolutely not. It’s thought to keep things as simple as possible, that’s why Infugrator is the most beginner friendly plugin in the market.

Will Infugrator slow down my website?

Absolutely not. Infugrator is carefully built with performance in mind and by following strict development standards to ensure things run smooth and fast.
